meanings.definition: A person who sells newspapers, magazines, and other periodicals.
meanings.sent1: The newsagents on the corner always has the latest newspapers.
meanings.sent2: I buy my favorite magazine from the newsagents near my house.
meanings.sent3: The newsagents must have a lot of newspapers to read every day!
meanings.sent4: She was like a newsagents, always sharing the latest gossip.
meanings.sent5: The newsagents greeted me with a smile as I entered the store.

meanings.definition: A store where newspapers, magazines, and other periodicals are sold.
meanings.sent1: Let's stop by the newsagents to pick up the latest issue of the newspaper.
meanings.sent2: The newsagents is a convenient place to grab a magazine on the go.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if the newsagents has any special deals on newspapers today.
meanings.sent4: The newsagents was a treasure trove of information waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The newsagents displayed a colorful array of magazines in the window.
